NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 CASSAVA: What.. what has transpired? Everyone has become unresponsive, and this mysterious matter permeates everywhere I project to... 2 1 CASSAVA: No.. No.. This can't be... Everyone is... 3 2 CASSAVA: Daz... My friends, my clan.. Everyone, all in an instant? How? What caused this..? 4 2 CASSAVA: Was I the only one untouched by whatever calamity has befallen my clan? Why have I alone been spared? 5 4 CASSAVA: Am I now trapped here without escape? I have little chance of staving off thirst and hunger for long.. 6 5 CASSAVA: Wait.. Daz's voyager stones! I can voyage and traverse outside of the station safely using these voyager stones! 7 6 CASSAVA: I.. I must seek out and understand what has happened. as well as to search for any other survivors.. Deep Storm Station ENTERED 1 Stowaways DSS 1 6
